text: The Main road 354 () is a short bypass direction First class main road near Debrecen, that connects the Main road 4, near Hajdúhadház to the Debrecen- észak junction in M35 motorway. The road is long.Magyarország, autóatlasz 1:200.000, Honvédelmi Minisztérium Térképészeti Kht., . The road, as well as all other main roads in Hungary, is managed and maintained by Magyar Közút, state owned company. ==See also== * Roads in Hungary ==Sources== ==External links== * Hungarian Public Road Non-Profit Ltd. (Magyar Közút Nonprofit Zrt.) * National Infrastructure Developer Ltd. Category:Main roads in Hungary Category:Hajdú-Bihar County
title: Main road 354 (Hungary)
